item.description:
An interesting show that changes every month, and is impossible to predict.  Have a drink before and during the show, then enjoy the show!  Past performances have included Rory Raven, Superchief Trio, the Empire Review players, local poets and musicians, slam poetry.  Served a school lunch once on entry, even.

 

$8 at the door for entrance.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the bar hanging until doors open and its time to find a seat
item.why: Local Performers put on a monthly review show: Music, Sketch Comedy, Burlesque, Local Performers... all for $8 with a bar attached!
item.name: Empire Review
